means: 无与伦比的，盖世无双的

sentence.Network_en: People say: " Guilin's scenery is peerless in the world . " It was not until I visited the place that I found it really worthy of the reputation.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们都说 “ 桂林山水甲天下 ”,到桂林一看,果然名不虚传.

sentence.Network_en: His Chinese kung fu is peerless.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的中国功夫是无敌的。

sentence.Network_en: The longan repairs the brains, this type of beverage, be: Peerless beverage.
sentence.Network_cn: 龙眼补脑汁, 这一种饮料, 就是: 盖世无双的饮料.

To be a peerless man is very difficult ., 做一个出类拔萃的人是很不容易的.

encyclopedia.content: 《Peerless》简介 Darin Zanyar是瑞典歌坛新人，成名于2004年度瑞典流行偶像大赛。出生于1987年的他是当年的瑞典偶像亚军，现在瑞典当红的偶像歌手。 2005年9月28日，他的同名专辑《Darin》一经发行就登上了瑞典排行榜冠军，而这首《B What U Wanna B》正是来自这样一张备受瞩目的专辑。2006年12月，Darin Zanyar又重拳出击，推出全新专辑《Break The News》，同样受到了歌迷的追捧。《Peerless》并非真名 真名 网络上流传的英文

entry.tran: 无可匹敌的；盖世无双的
entry.def: Something that is peerless is so beautiful or wonderful that you feel that nothing can equal it.

example.ex: ...two days of clear sunshine under peerless blue skies.
example.tran: 无比蔚蓝的天空下的两个艳阳天

auth_sentence.content: But each was unique, peerless, sui generis.
auth_sentence.res_content: But each was unique, peerless, sui generis.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But each was unique, peerless, sui generis.

auth_sentence.content: Beyond Messi, he has proved himself to be peerless.
auth_sentence.res_content: Beyond Messi, he has proved himself to be peerless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Beyond Messi, he has proved himself to be peerless.

auth_sentence.content: Meanwhile his guitar skills remain as idiosyncratic and peerless as ever.
auth_sentence.res_content: Meanwhile his guitar skills remain as idiosyncratic and peerless as ever.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Meanwhile his guitar skills remain as idiosyncratic and peerless as ever.
